Description: Please Read Entire Description Below and See All Pictures Before purchasing because this is a final sale item. Dita Mach One Made in Japan Sunglasses. $750 Retail. Model # DRX-2030-F-BLK-12k-59 (Matte Black and Gold). G-15 Green Gradient Lenses with Purple Anti-reflective coating. Size: 59 - 17 - 127. Make sure this size works before purchasing because there are no returns or exchanges. Condition:Lenses are good overall, but there is a noticeable mark at the bottom of the lens from the earpiece rubbing against and touching the lens as circle in the photos. Frame is in good condition. Arms feel a little bit loose when opening and closing and may need to be tightened, and as you can see in the photos these require a special tool to tighten as it is not a regular screw used in this model. Original case shows moderate wear. Includes only what is pictured. Pictures are of actual item taken right before the start of the auction. PLEASE MAKE SURE THIS SIZE WORKS FOR YOU BEFORE PURCHASING BECAUSE ALL SALES ARE FINAL. FINAL SALE. NO RETURNS. PICTURES ARE OF THE ACTUAL ITEM.
